name: Praise The FireLord
description:
Please play in fullscreen 

 -------------------------

You've been banished from the fire realm for breadking your Lord's favorite vase !

As a punishment for your clumsiness, you have been sent to the land of eternal winter, where the snow never melt...

Luckily you're not the only demon roaming this cursed lands.

Prey to the fire! Make it grow !  Turn up the Heat ! And use it to enrole an army of demons to help you in your task. Maybe together you might regain your lord's favors !

-------------------------

This is an Iddle/Clicker game & its very long to beat.

"But You're crazy ! This is a jam ! Nobody will play it for days !"

Well That's the thing... You don't have too !

You can let it run in the background & check on it, from time to time, between other jam games.

You can even close it & come back later. Your demons will keep working while you're gone ! (but at half speed, because they're lazy when nobody is watching them)

If you're really not into this genre of games or don't have the time for it. We added a cheat multiplier so you can race through the game & see the ending anyway.  At x100 it should take you around 15 min to beat.

-------------------------

Key binding

Toggle Menu : Esc / P

Toggle Cheat Menu : C
